content: GPT-5.2 is capable of various advanced tasks, including beehive simulation, Photoshop cloning, image-to-3D model conversion, Windows and MS Office cloning, night sky viewing, anime character labeling, object finding (e.g., Waldo), table-to-spreadsheet conversion, flowchart image-to-HTML conversion, camouflage testing, medical scan analysis, and geoguessing.
